# Integration

```{r eval = FALSE}
# get samples to integrate
sample_list <- c("7974", "8194")
# files <- list.files(glue("{proj_dir}/data"), recursive = "TRUE", pattern = "HR_automatic_annotated_CT.rds", full.names = TRUE) %>% 
  # grep(pattern = paste(sample_list, collapse = "|"), value = TRUE)
files <- c(glue("{proj_dir}/data/CSF_02/output/05_CellTypist/7974_HR_automatic_annotated_CT.rds"), 
           glue("{proj_dir}/data/CSF_06/output/05_CellTypist/8194_HR_automatic_annotated_CT.rds"))
data <- purrr::map(files, readRDS)
```

```{r eval = FALSE}
data <- merge(data[[1]], data[[2]])

data <- data %>%
  NormalizeData() %>% 
  FindVariableFeatures(nfeatures = 3000) %>%
  ScaleData() %>%
  RunPCA()

# defined the group_by_vars variable as a factor
data@meta.data$sample <- as.factor(data@meta.data$sample)
data <- RunHarmony(data, group.by.vars = c("sample"))

data <- data %>%
  RunUMAP(reduction = "harmony", dims = 1:25) %>%
  FindNeighbors(reduction = "harmony", dims = 1:25) %>%
  FindClusters(resolution = seq(0.1, 1, 0.1))

data$annot <- recode(data$annot,
                     "T cells - NK" = "T cells",
                     "DC1" = "DC", 
                     "Tumor" = "Other cells",
                     "Prolif" = "Proliferative",
                     "Myeloid" = "Myeloid cells"
                     )

# save clustered dataset
saveRDS(data, glue("{out_dir}/all_cells_integrated.rds"))
```

# TCR

```{r eval = FALSE}
S1 <- read.csv(glue("{proj_dir}/data/CSF_02/jobs/7974/7974/outs/per_sample_outs/7974/vdj_t/filtered_contig_annotations.csv"))
S2 <- read.csv(glue("{proj_dir}/data/CSF_06/jobs/8194/8194/outs/per_sample_outs/8194/vdj_t/filtered_contig_annotations.csv"))
S3 <- read.csv(glue("{proj_dir}/data/CSF_02/jobs/7974/7974/outs/per_sample_outs/7974/vdj_b/filtered_contig_annotations.csv"))
S4 <- read.csv(glue("{proj_dir}/data/CSF_06/jobs/8194/8194/outs/per_sample_outs/8194/vdj_b/filtered_contig_annotations.csv"))

contig_list_TCR <- list(S1, S2)
contig_list_BCR <- list(S3, S4)

# TCR
combined_tcr <- combineTCR(contig_list_TCR, 
                ID = sample_list, 
                samples = c("CSF_02", "CSF_06")
                )

# rename to match sc
combined_tcr$CSF_02_7974$barcode <- str_remove_all(combined_tcr$CSF_02_7974$barcode, pattern = "-1$|-2$|-3$")
combined_tcr$CSF_06_8194$barcode <- str_remove_all(combined_tcr$CSF_06_8194$barcode, pattern = "-1$|-2$|-3$")

# BCR
combined_bcr <- combineBCR(contig_list_BCR,
                ID = sample_list,
                samples = c("CSF_02", "CSF_06")
                )

# rename to match sc
combined_bcr$CSF_02_7974$barcode <- str_remove_all(combined_bcr$CSF_02_7974$barcode, pattern = "-1$|-2$|-3$")
combined_bcr$CSF_06_8194$barcode <- str_remove_all(combined_bcr$CSF_06_8194$barcode, pattern = "-1$|-2$|-3$")

list.receptors <- c(combined_tcr, combined_bcr)

data <- combineExpression(
  list.receptors, 
  data, 
  cloneCall="aa", 
  proportion = FALSE, 
  cloneTypes=c(Single=1, Small=5, Medium=20, Large=50, Hyperexpanded=100))

# save annotated object with TCR data
saveRDS(data, glue("{out_dir}/all_cells_integrated.rds"))
```

df <- data@meta.data[, c("sample", "cloneType", "CTaa", "annot")] %>% 
  filter(!is.na(CTaa)) %>% 
  filter(annot %in% c("T cells", "B cells"))
rownames(df) <- NULL
df <- unique(df)
table(df[, c("sample", "cloneType", "annot")]) %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=sample, y=Freq, fill=cloneType)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity", position=position_dodge()) +
  geom_text(aes(label=Freq), vjust=-0.5, color="black",
            position = position_dodge(0.9), size=3.5) +
  facet_grid(.~annot) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = colorblind_vector) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(plot.title = element_blank(),
        text = element_text(size = 18))
